title: I got the wrong icon from the 10 years gift
body: Hi rito, I got the wrong icon from the 10 year gift, I got a teemo one while it's a poro one. Please fix it for me, thank you.

replies.body: You'd have to email their support team - they won't answer a Boards post about it.
You can shoot us a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). :)

i'd keep the teemo icon
teemo is love
teemo Is life ;)
